module.name: functional_specification
module.keywords: module, functional specification, behavioural specification, signal, signal specification, test bench

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the measured behaviour of a functional element under a set of controlled conditions. It also defines the information needed to describe equivalents among different functional elements.
